filesystem

Interface FileSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryFileSystem, MockFileSystem

    public interface FileSystem
    The file system interface.
    Author:
    greff

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeWorkingDir(Path path)
      Changes the current working directory to the location at path.
      java.lang.String getAbsolutePathOfFSElement(FSElement theElement)
      Gets the absolute path to an element in the filesystem.

      Gets a directory by the given path.

    • Method Detail

      • changeWorkingDir

        void changeWorkingDir(Path path)
               throws MalformedPathException,
                      FSElementNotFoundException
        Changes the current working directory to the location at path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the new working directory.
        Throws:
        MalformedPathException - Throws if the path is invalid.
        FSElementNotFoundException - Throws if the file/directory is not found.

      • getAbsolutePathOfFSElement

        java.lang.String getAbsolutePathOfFSElement(FSElement theElement)
        Gets the absolute path to an element in the filesystem.
        Parameters:
        theElement - The target fselement.
        Returns:
        Returns a string with the absolute path.

      • getFileByPath

        File<?> getFileByPath(Path path)
               throws MalformedPathException,
                      FSElementNotFoundException
        Gets a file by the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path.
        Returns:
        Returns the found file.
        Throws:
        MalformedPathException - Thrown if the path is invalid.
        FSElementNotFoundException - Thrown if no file is found.

      • getDirByPath

        Directory getDirByPath(Path path)
                throws MalformedPathException,
                       FSElementNotFoundException
        Gets a directory by the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path.
        Returns:
        Returns the found directory.
        Throws:
        MalformedPathException - Thrown if the path is invalid.
        FSElementNotFoundException - Thrown if no directory is found.

      • getWorkingDir

        Directory getWorkingDir()
        Gets the current working directory.
        Returns:
        Returns the currently working directory.

      • getWorkingDirPath

        java.lang.String getWorkingDirPath()
        Gets the absolute path of the current working directory.
        Returns:
        Returns the absolute path of the current working directory.

      • getRoot

        Directory getRoot()
        Gets the root directory of the file system.
        Returns:
        Returns the root directory.

      • getFSElementByPath

        FSElement getFSElementByPath(Path path)
                      throws MalformedPathException,
                             FSElementNotFoundException
        Gets a FS element by the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path.
        Returns:
        Returns the found FS element.
        Throws:
        MalformedPathException - Thrown if the path is invalid.
        FSElementNotFoundException - Thrown if no FS element is found.
